greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Matrix square of triangle A121412.
comment: Row n of triangle T=A121412 equals row (n-1) of T^(n+1) with an appended '1'.
program: (PARI) {T(n, k)=local(A=Mat(1), B); for(m=1, n+1, B=matrix(m, m); for(i=1, m, for(j=1, i, if(j==i, B[i, j]=1, B[i, j]=(A^i)[i-1, j]); )); A=B); return((A^2)[n+1, k+1])}
results.author: _Paul D. Hanna_, Aug 22 2006
